auth.resetPasswordTitle: Enter your email to reset your password.
auth.signUpSuccessText: Your account has been created successfully. You can now log in.

auth.setPasswordSuccessText: Now you can log in using your new password.

errorBoundary.explanation: An error has occurred. In some cases, reloading the page can resolve the issue. If the error persists, please contact us.
